name: EXMOC
description: EXMOC token is the cryptocurrency which powers the exmoc.com platform. The platform offers an NFT Marketplace and an upcoming NFT Game. The EXMOC NFT Marketplace allows users to buy and resell NFTS and collaborate with other members. A limited NFT collection where the token itself doubles as a membership to our Exclusive Club. Holding EXMOC Coins & NFTs gives special Privileges like access to our future events, free airdrops.
